from ase import Atoms
from ase.calculators.crystal import CRYSTAL
from ase.optimize import BFGS
from pydantic import BaseModel

from annotations.models.CrystalParameters import CrystalParameters
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def structure_generation_3f8a05fd4932317ad802e8360c0a3eb2e3243c09(
    parameters: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass


def crystal14_geometric_relaxation(
    atoms: Atoms, parameters: CrystalParameters
) -> Atoms:
    crystal_keys = [
        "restart",
        "xc",
        "spinpol",
        "guess",
        "basis",
        "kpts",
        "isp",
        "smearing",
    ]
    parameter_dict = {
        k: v for k, v in parameters.dict(exclude_none=True).items() if k in crystal_keys
    }
    calc = CRYSTAL(**parameter_dict)
    atoms.set_calculator(calc)
    dyn = BFGS(atoms)
    dyn.run(parameters.fmax)
    return atoms


# Inputs Code



class CrystalParameters(BaseModel):
    version: bool | None = None
    restart: bool | None = None
    xc: str | None = None
    spinpol: bool | None = None
    guess: bool | None = None
    basis: str | None = None
    kpts: str | list[int] | None = None
    isp: int | None = None
    smearing: float | None = None
    fmax: float | None = 1e-5

    class Config:
        extra = "allow"



class StructureMetadata(BaseModel):
    id: str | None = None
    name: str | None = None
    type: str | None = None
    composition: str | None = None
    description: str | None = None
    vacuum_x: float | None = None
    vacuum_y: float | None = None
    vacuum_z: float | None = None
    supercell: str | None = None
    cas_number: str | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    lattice_a: float | None = None
    lattice_b: float | None = None
    lattice_c: float | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    mp_id: str | None = None

structure_metadata_Cs3_citrate = StructureMetadata.parse_raw('{"name": "Tricaesium citrate monohydrate,", "type": "molecular", "composition": "Cs3C6H5O7H2O", "description": "crystal lattice", "vacuum_x": NaN, "vacuum_y": NaN, "vacuum_z": NaN, "supercell": "1x1x1", "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_a": 7.7529, "lattice_b": 12.0281, "lattice_c": 13.8043, "space group": "P2_1/n", "orientation": NaN, "mp_id": NaN}')

crystal_parameters_4 = CrystalParameters.parse_raw('{"version": 9, "restart": NaN, "xc": "B3LYP", "spinpol": NaN, "guess": NaN, "basis": NaN, "kpts": "[8,8,8]", "isp": NaN, "smearing": NaN, "tolinteg": NaN, "toldee": NaN, "fmax": NaN, "Rb_basis": NaN}')

# Execution Code

Cs3_citrate = structure_generation_3f8a05fd4932317ad802e8360c0a3eb2e3243c09(structure_metadata_Cs3_citrate)
relaxed_structure = crystal14_geometric_relaxation(Cs3_citrate, crystal_parameters_4)

from ase import Atoms
from ase.calculators.crystal import CRYSTAL
from ase.optimize import BFGS
from pydantic import BaseModel

from annotations.models.CrystalParameters import CrystalParameters
from annotations.models.StructureMetadata import StructureMetadata

# Functions Code



def crystal14_geometric_relaxation(
    atoms: Atoms, parameters: CrystalParameters
) -> Atoms:
    crystal_keys = [
        "restart",
        "xc",
        "spinpol",
        "guess",
        "basis",
        "kpts",
        "isp",
        "smearing",
    ]
    parameter_dict = {
        k: v for k, v in parameters.dict(exclude_none=True).items() if k in crystal_keys
    }
    calc = CRYSTAL(**parameter_dict)
    atoms.set_calculator(calc)
    dyn = BFGS(atoms)
    dyn.run(parameters.fmax)
    return atoms


def structure_generation_3f8a05fd4932317ad802e8360c0a3eb2e3243c09(
    parameters: StructureMetadata,
) -> Atoms:
    pass


# Inputs Code



class StructureMetadata(BaseModel):
    id: str | None = None
    name: str | None = None
    type: str | None = None
    composition: str | None = None
    description: str | None = None
    vacuum_x: float | None = None
    vacuum_y: float | None = None
    vacuum_z: float | None = None
    supercell: str | None = None
    cas_number: str | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    lattice_a: float | None = None
    lattice_b: float | None = None
    lattice_c: float | None = None
    orientation: str | None = None
    mp_id: str | None = None



class CrystalParameters(BaseModel):
    version: bool | None = None
    restart: bool | None = None
    xc: str | None = None
    spinpol: bool | None = None
    guess: bool | None = None
    basis: str | None = None
    kpts: str | list[int] | None = None
    isp: int | None = None
    smearing: float | None = None
    fmax: float | None = 1e-5

    class Config:
        extra = "allow"

structure_metadata_Cs3_citrate = StructureMetadata.parse_raw('{"name": "Tricaesium citrate monohydrate,", "type": "molecular", "composition": "Cs3C6H5O7H2O", "description": "crystal lattice", "vacuum_x": NaN, "vacuum_y": NaN, "vacuum_z": NaN, "supercell": "1x1x1", "cas_number": NaN, "lattice_a": 7.7529, "lattice_b": 12.0281, "lattice_c": 13.8043, "space group": "P2_1/n", "orientation": NaN, "mp_id": NaN}')

crystal_parameters_4 = CrystalParameters.parse_raw('{"version": 9, "restart": NaN, "xc": "B3LYP", "spinpol": NaN, "guess": NaN, "basis": NaN, "kpts": "[8,8,8]", "isp": NaN, "smearing": NaN, "tolinteg": NaN, "toldee": NaN, "fmax": NaN, "Rb_basis": NaN}')

# Execution Code

Cs3_citrate = structure_generation_3f8a05fd4932317ad802e8360c0a3eb2e3243c09(structure_metadata_Cs3_citrate)
relaxed_structure = crystal14_geometric_relaxation(Cs3_citrate, crystal_parameters_4)
